body.name: Gourmetop Magnetic Knife Holder for Wall, Knife Magnetic Strip No Drilling 16.5″, Kitchen Magnetic Knife Holder for Refrigerator, Wood Magnetic Knife Rack/Bar for Fridge
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 8 mins
features: 【3x Magnet Strength to Hold More】 Embedded with selected N35 neodymium magnets that provide good magnet strength, Gourmetop magnetic knife holder for wall offers greater force to hold knives or other ferromagnetic tools that reach weights of over 25 pounds, a safer & better solution to store all kinds of kitchen knives;

【Designed for Protection】Engineered from 100% Acacia Wood that is both highly durable and Beautiful, The smooth surface of this wooden magnetic knife strip not only alleviates worries of scratches or dings on knives, but also inhibits knives from sliding around. Moreover, this magnetic knife rack is easy to clean and super safe as acacia wood can safely be used for preparing and serving food;

【No Drilling Mounting Only for Refrigerators & Tiles】Aiming to mount on refrigerators and tiles, Gourmetop magnetic knife holder for wall comes with strong adhesive tapes that provide high bond strength to glossy surfaces of refrigerators & tiles. Please notice that pushing all the air out of the adhesive tape is the key for powerful adhesion and the adhesive tapes are only suggested to use on tiles & refrigerators (not on other walls as plaster);

【Mounting Option 2 – Drilling Mounting Designed for All Types of Kitchen Walls】 Gourmetop magnetic knife strip is also packed with the mounting hardware for securing it to all types of kitchen walls including tiles, wood, stone or stucco. All you need are a basic drill and a screwdriver to complete the installation;

【We Not Only Provide Knife Magnetic Strip】All Gourmetop knife magnetic strips are under 1-Year Warranty. As we value every customer’s voice and experience with our products as well as with our service, we provide 24hrs/7days non-stop customer support to you. Pls feel free to contact us whenever you are concerned about the product or after-sales service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page Adhesive Mounting is only for Glossy Surfaces as the ones of Refrigerators & Tiles. Pls note that after mounting the magnetic knife strip on the wall, one needs to unscrew the knife bar down and use fingers to push out all air from the adhesive tapes.(This step decides the adhesion strength).
Previous page Next page You can download the User Manual as the step-by-step installation instructions from our page.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds my knives well, easy to install, super convenient, very modern look.
reviews.reviewText: I appreciate the sleek and modern appearance of the wood on the gourmetop magnetic knife holder. This holder accommodates a variety of knives, regardless of their size, making it incredibly convenient and safe to use. The sturdy design ensures that I don't have to worry about it causing any damage to my walls or any other concerns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and great looking!
reviews.reviewText: This knife set is a wonderful addition to my kitchen! The knife set looks very beautiful on my kitchen counter!These knives are very easy to work with. They are great quality, sharp, easy to grip and non-slip. Since they are very comfortable to hold and sharp, large amounts of food preparation is now easier for me. These are easy to clean and also dishwasher safe.The set includes various kinds of knives and a pair of kitchen shears. I love that this set also comes with a few other kitchen essentials like a knife sharpener, measuring cups, cutting board, pastry brush, peeler, and a spatula.I love cooking and and this knife set has made my food preparation process quicker, easier and enjoyable. I recommend this highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good, holds knives tight, Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I spent 10 minutes installing this. It took that long because I had to pull out my drill and level, not because it was that hard. I chose to install with the wall anchors, which seem good enough to me, instead of adhesive, so I can't speak to the effectiveness of that option. The holes are large enough that I could use a pencil lead to mark the holes without any issue. The only question mark on this is that, yes, it comes with wooden plugs to put over the screw holes, but they do not sit flush, friction fit, or come with a way to remove them. I'm a bit nervous to figure out how to remove it since I can't fit anything around it, and I can't just tip the block over to spill them out since it's attached to the wall. Maybe a vacuum?Nonetheless, it dresses the kitchen up, holds onto knives tight, and gets the knives out of our drawer. For the price, it's hard to find a better option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great design, but be careful with painted walls
reviews.reviewText: This is a great designed product. It looks and performs great. It comes with 2 mounting methods, drywall inserts with screws and stick tabs.I wouldn't use the sticky tabs on drywall or painted walls, they will rip the paint off. These are NOT like 3M peel-away sticky tabs. I recommend only using the sticky tabs on metal or tile surfaces unless you're willing to spackle and re-paint the wall after you remove them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, magnet is strong
reviews.reviewText: I have this stuck to the side of my fridge. I love the look. One thing I did notice it that my fridge side has a slight arc so it does not fit flush. When mounting the adhesive, I screwed the adhesive on the holder, placed it on the fridge and then removed the screws and the holder. Then I firmly pressed the ahdesive on to the fridge and reinstalled the holder.My coutertop space is limited and this freed up a bunch of space by removing the wood block holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to install, looks beautiful on my wall and puts my knives at my reach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Knife Holder
reviews.reviewText: This knife holder is fantastic! I love to cook, so I have a few knives. Keeping them in my drawer or having them in a knife block was just taking up space that I needed for other appliances and tools, however, this knife holder takes care of that problem. Here are my Pros and Cons for this product: Pros- It helps me maximize the small kitchen space I have, letting me focus what's important... Food- The wood finish looks great and helps show off the cooking arsenal- The magnets are pretty strong, so you don't have to worry about the knives falling off and damaging someone or themselves, if you were to bump something into it- The adhesion is strong, and you don't have to drill into the wall and damage it. (I messed up my placement the first time and pulled it off to readjust the strip, and I don't have any problems with staying on the wall.) Cons- The magnets do not keep the knives from turning very well since it can pivot on the one row of magnets- The wood finish could be a little thicker. I have only had this for a little while, and there are already a few scratches/cuts on the surfaceAltogether though, I really enjoy this product. The Price and Quality give it a full 5 stars for me. Hopefully this review can help you figure out if this is the right product for you and your kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this for the side of my refrigerator so I used the adhesive pads. The screws secure to the pads well, and the wooden plugs make it look clean. Magnet feels nice and strong. 10/10 would recommend.

This knife set is definitely worth the money. The knives seem to be very high quality & are every bit as sharp as my surgical scalpels. They glide through raw beef with almost no pressure. The steak knives aren't bad, but the serrated area is too long & takes some getting used to. The keeper block is solid wood & is heavy enough that it won't tip or move around on the counter. The rest of the accessories are decent cheap quality & should last a long time. The sharpener looks robust & is of the type that puts the very best edges onto knives. The shears are strongly built & very sharp, although I wouldn't use them on steel cans. All in all, this set is a great bargain.
Magnets excellent, presentation great, easy to install. I will be buying another for my partner. Couldn't be more pleased.
Knives are very sharp, seem to be one solid piece, and the price to value ratio is very good. Overall a great purchase
Do not overestimate these reviews these are sharp! I’m not sure but I’ve cut myself way to many times the price is great for this set would order again.
This was very easy to install and holds the knifes very well.
